title: Abolition of the Wicked - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts
author: Kwon Tae-yong   Ryu Jin
description:
Moorim master of the arts, Moorim Absolute Evil, Murim’s most feared blood-lion.

And an eight-year-old death penalty, Geom Woo-bin, who suddenly appeared one day.

“Dear Death Penalty, you know that we love you, right?”

A delightful Moorim story unfolded by five priests.>
